Text: This is the new expansion pack.  So at over 2 gigs, are you also including the original Cossacks II in this release or is all that data *just* the expansion?

And just moments later I answer my own question upon reading that Battle for Europe is a "stand-alone" expansion pack.   I'd probably smack whoever came up with that bullshitingly vague terminology, but I get the point that the original game isn't needed to play this.  Ktnx.

Cossacks 2 är ett underbart spel som jag precis har upptäckt :)

Första Cossacks tyckte jag verkligen inte om, men det här är kanon.

För de som har problem att installera:

- Packa upp cd 1-3 med t.ex. winrar.
- Mounta skivorna med senaste Daemon.
- Installera spelet.
- Kopiera innehållet i CD3\Run\Data till installationsmappen\Run\Data
- Låt CD3 vara mountad och välj Emulera Safedisc.

Spelet fungerar utmärkt.

Avast reports a trojan in the patchtool folder as zapagog already mentioned! The good news is that Kenshin-O's procedure works like a charm! Thank you all guys!

Important!!!!! Make sure (for Windows Vista) you right click the game, go to properties, select Windows XP Compatibility Mode. Hit okay. Right click game and select Run as Administrator. It should run now.

If you don't do it this way on Vista, you might not be able to make it work.

I got this to work great without any lag on Vista. 
1. download the game.
2. Unzip or Unrar each CD folder.
Use Daemon tools (I used MagicDisk) to mount the .BIN file onto a virtual drive.
3. Manually explore the CD1 and right-click on AutoRun.exe, select "Run as Administrator."
4. Install the game.
5. Now you need to replace "engine.exe" with a cracked engine.exe found at Google.com (It should not be hard to find). install the cracked russian/english cossacks 2 engine.exe from here.
6. Now the game will work without any Starforce bullshit. Hurray! But it will be LAGGY (slow framerate). To fix the lag you have to go to the game directory cossacks2/run/data/log.txt. open up log.txt and erase it so it's blank. no spaces or anything, leave it blank. if you can't do this, make a blank log.txt file in another folder, than Copy and Replace it into run/data directory. Once you do this, right click log.txt and select Properties. Mark "read-only." 
7. now it should work without starforce, without lag, and without any cds. hurray!

sorry, but if you read the comments, you would see that two people already said that. Thats usually a good hint to not download it.

Have you guys never heard of a false positive? It's not Malware, it's just a program that isn't recognised by Windows because it has a cracking/unlocking code in it. It's not legal, so it shows up as Malware.
